A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I usually never do reviews but created an account because I needed to vent and also counter the individuals that claim these reviews are done by bots.
This movie left me with mixed feelings and mildly confused/in denial. For most reasons already mentioned in other reviews. The longer I analyzed the movie the worse it got.
Apart from sloppy writing this movie is designed to upset long-time fans on many levels and on many occasions. Again\, for reasons already mentioned in other reviews. This was a professional hitjob. I've read about ignoring Chekov's gun but I think it goes way beyond that. Not only is every expectation killed\, there is simply no fulfillment at all. Viewers need characters to succeed or die\, as we wish subconciously ourselves. Now let's compare: 

TLJ 
- luke fights but wait it was a projection. Evaporates and is dead\, or is he?
- casino storyline does not meet its goal
- phasma is not killed but falls to death\, or is she?
- finn goes to die in the big hole of the canon but gets blocked at the last moment (I won't even get into the freudian elements here but it is an obvious theme throughout the movie)
